itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: John Henry "Jack" Gore (16 June 1899 – 18 March 1971) was a Welsh international rugby flanker who played rugby union for Blaina and rugby league for Salford. His son, Billy Gore, played international rugby for Wales national rugby union team the same as his father.

link_mentions.page: 1924–25 New Zealand rugby union tour of Britain, Ireland and France
